about_the_game:
A pack of heads created by the community, for the community!

These heads were created for a contest in mid 2019 - we received 324 individual head files, and collected the best into this pack. If this is successful we may make this a regular way to support KAG - as sales from these heads go towards keeping the game alive!



This pack contains 58 Unique heads, with male and female versions where appropriate:

  • Bucket Head
  • Blonde Viking
  • Highlands Fighter
  • Chef
  • Arrow Through Head
  • Rock Band Member
  • Conquistador
  • Duck
  • Grey Ghost
  • Brown Ghost
  • Skeleton
  • Techno Monster
  • Merchant
  • Turban
  • Haku Lei
  • Jester
  • Visor Helmet
  • Candle Hat
  • Beard
  • Derp Potato
  • Plumed Helmet
  • Crusader
  • Golden Crusader
  • Golden Feather Crusader
  • Masked Helm
  • Masked Helm With Plume
  • Masked Helm With Mohawk
  • Plumed Bucket Helm
  • Hard Hat

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This cosmetic DLC contains over 50 Unique heads, lovingly created by the KAG community to support the game!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian
*languages with full audio support
